# A palindrome is ...

- "an expression that reads the same forwards and backwards"

::: {.fragment}

- "Taco Cat" is not equal to "taC ocaT"
:::

::: {.fragment}
- ignore letter casing (`tolower`, `str_to_lower`)
:::

::: {.fragment}
- "taco cat" is still not equal to "tac ocat"
:::

::: {.fragment}
- ignore spaces and punctuation (`stri_replace`)
:::

::: {.fragment}
- "tacocat" is equal to "tacocat"!
:::
